subject: Dear sir/ma,
body:
Dear sir/ma,
How are you today sir/ma?.
Please do not ignore this vital information.
Some rich and highly influential Saudi businessman wants to steal your
contract/Inheritance fund. It is not actually his fault because some
two desperate and corrupt Nigeria government officials told him you
are dead, so he is pushing the process as your heir (next-of-kin) with
a wrong belief. I am revealing this to you because I think it is not
right what they are doing to you, and you should not be trampled upon
and oppressed by the supper rich and the highly connected.
I will give you more details upon your response; that is if you will
permit me to direct you on how best to approach this situation. He has
already paid all the processing fees and is now awaiting Foreign
Exchange approval for the fund to be released and wired to his bank
account in Switzerland. But there is a delay now due to National
revenue drop caused by the dwindling Crude oil prize which is the
major source of the countryâ€™s revenue.
The Saudi man is even in the country as I write this message, but you
will surely beat him to his games because his contacts at the
Presidency will fail him the leadership baton has changed at the
presidency following the defeat of his close friend (former president
Muhammadu Buhari) by the Opposition in the just concluded Presidential
Election.  Just get back to me very quickly, and I will guide you on
simple things to do to retrieve this fund immediately.
Thanks,
Awaits your urgent response.
Regards,
Danladi Ahmed.

subject: Re: Dear sir/ma,
body:
Hello Danladi Ahmed,

I hope this message finds you well. Your email certainly caught my attention and I must say, it's quite a situation! It's hard to believe that someone would go to such lengths based on false information.

Could you please provide more details about this situation? How did these officials come to the conclusion that I was no longer alive? And how did this Saudi individual get involved in the first place?

Also, could you explain more about the process he has gone through so far? You mentioned he paid processing fees - what were these for exactly?

Lastly, what role does the change in presidency play in all of this? How does it affect the situation?

Looking forward to your response.

Best wishes,
Robert
